document_data.name: Amsha al-Lanim
document_data.mainbody: '''Amsha al-Lanim''' was in charge of the [[Gate of the Ghost]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Amsha was harsh and strict, relentlessly driving her employees to strive for perfection in their duties.
document_data.Activities:
Amsha took great pride in running the busiest gate in all of Huzuz—a gate that admitted more people to the city than even the whole harbor.

She took her job very seriously and never missed a day of work in eight years on the post, including the days when she gave birth to her two children.
document_data.Relationships: Unable to find an [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharan]] husband who would tolerate her lofty career goals, Amsha married a [[Ajami|foreign wizard]] named [[Elfinster]], who operated a small school.
document_data.Possessions: Amsha owned a magical [[longsword]] and [[jambiya]]. Her wedding ring was actually a ''[[ring of regeneration]]''.
